title: Epic 01.x: FlowBundle Runtime Packaging
description: Remove executor() boilerplate by introducing FlowBundle abstraction that packages ValidatedIR + node resolver + entrypoint metadata

title: Extend dag-macros with _register() helpers and workflow_bundle!
Migrate examples s1_echo, s2_site, s3_branching to workflow_bundle!
Migrate examples s4_preflight, s5_unsupported_surface, s6_spill to workflow_bundle!
Refactor CLI to consume FlowBundle instead of executor()+constants
Define FlowBundle types in host-inproc
description: Blocked: kernel-exec NodeHandler is private and NodeRegistry::handler is pub(crate), so host-inproc cannot implement NodeResolver signature or resolve handlers. Need coordinator decision to expose NodeHandler/handler or adjust trait.

title: Expose NodeHandler and handler method in kernel-exec
description: Make NodeHandler trait public and expose NodeRegistry::handler method so host-inproc can implement NodeResolver. Prerequisite for FlowBundle types.
